description: Amendments to planning permission dated 8th August 2024 (RN: 24/03734/FULL) for, 'Demolition and reconstruction of rear extensions at lower ground and ground floor level to create an enlarged first floor terrace; excavation of front pavement vaults; repairs to the front and rear facades; replacement of windows with double glazed timber windows; modifications to the rear mansard to create a concealed plant area and lift overrun, and new dormer windows; and associated alterations; all to alter and extend dwellinghouse (Class C3)'; Namely, external alterations, previous consented metal railings to rear party wall amended to brick wall with stone coping, flemish bond with pointing to match existing  wall, second floor central bay timber tripartite sash window amended to narrower timber single sash window, adjustments to line of vertical wall to plant area within mansard and new natural Welsh slate to match existing.
